alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:19PM EDT until August 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SUSQUEHANNA COUNTY... At 519 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Great Bend to near Montrose, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Montrose, Hallstead, New Milford, Great Bend, Brackney, South Montrose, Salt Springs State Park, Hickory Grove and Wyoanna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
